description: Rear roof extension incorporating a Juliet balcony, and installation of two roof lights to front roof slope (following demolition of two chimney stacks); single storey rear extension, (following demolition of existing rear addition)
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of 3 years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990.
| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title number(s): PR-01Rev A (proposed plans); PR-02 Rev A(proposed elevations)

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match those of the existing building unless indicated on the approved plans or application form. Development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved details.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), London Plan(2021) policies D3 and D4 and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021). | The proposed rooflights hereby approved shall not project more than 150mm from the roof plane and shall be retained as such for the lifetime of the development

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), London Plan(2021) policies D3 and D4 and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
